about_the_game:
• IRA was just an ordinary crossing guard robot (2nd class!) making sure that the kiddies were able to cross the street safely until that fateful day... when zombies attacked! Now his heroic subroutines have activated and he's ready to save the day!

  • In the future, the most popular entertainment is the Zombie Fun Run! Brave runners fight zombies & run to complete missions while viewers cheer for their favorites from the safety of their couches! It's the ultimate reality show!

  • Join the Zombie Fun Run Circuit and team up with Dylan the pizza delivery guy, Sara O'Connor the prepper, XOXO the goth pop star, and other allies as you run and fight your way to victory!

  • Adorable comic book-style cutscenes tell a story with twists, turns, pizza, and pandas! Enjoy a cozy apocalypse!

  • Turn-based combat against hordes of enemies. Control the flow of combat with pushes, ailments, items, and defensive moves!

  • Build momentum in combat to power-up your moves, unlock super attacks, and more. You don't need to defeat every enemy to win - build momentum and run, run, RUN!

  • From Zeboyd (Cthulhu Saves the World, Cosmic Star Heroine, This Way Madness Lies, and more!).

name: Zombie Fun Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Atom X7-Z8750
  • Graphics: Intel HD 405 Graphics 600 MHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Atom X7-Z8750
  • Graphics: Intel HD 405 Graphics 600 MHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: They're coming and we need your help! Join IRA, Crossing Guard Robot 2nd class, as he joins the Zombie Fun Run circuit and saves the day with the power of friendship and heavy artillery in this turn-based comedy RPG. The end of the world has never been so cozy!
